title: News: BBC Sound of 2013 Longlist Revealed
content:
With the end of the year drawing ever nearer, it’s time for the much argued over BBC Sound of 2013 to be unveiled.

Having predicted the rise of the likes of Adele, Florence and Franz Ferdinand, it’s normally a pretty good indication of which new acts will find airplay, and chart success over the following twelve months, however last years list notably missed off 2012’s hype band Alt-J. Compiled by a panel of 213 UK ‘tastemakers and influential figures’, the top three acts will be announced in the new year. The longlist features the likes of Drake collaborator The Weeknd, LA sister-trio Haim and London teenage crooner King Krule. Check out the full list below, as leaked by The Independent.

A*M*E

Angel Haze

Arlissa

Chvrches

Haim

King Krule

Kodaline

Laura Mvula

Little Green Cars

Palma Violets

Peace

Savages

The Weeknd

Tom Odell
